rules_text:
When Wishful Illusionist enters the battlefield, create a Glamour token. [i](It’s a colorless enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
{1}, Sacrifice a token: Put a +1/+1 counter on target non-Human creature.
